My name is Sowunmi Oluwamayowa, I am a recent graduate from the Federal Polytechnic Ilaro, where I earned my degree in Computer Science. During my time in the polytechnic, I was a member of Programmers' Hub and i served as the vice president of 2021/2022 academic session. I am also a self-taught web developer. I have always been fascinated by the power of the internet and enjoy using my skills to build websites that are both functional and visually appealing. I am also passionate about technology and am always looking to learn new programming languages and development tools.In my free time, I enjoy graphics designing with adobe photoshop, watching movies and playing games.I am currently seeking a job in software development and would love to connect with others in the industry.
